div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xj die mensis
marcij anno quo Supra

The saide day Cornelys opidane of the campuiris grantit him
content and pait of ale his fee hyr' and Costis aucht to him for his
seruice of Stermannyschip done be him in the kingis bark be the handis
of Dauid Steuart mastir vndir god of the saide Schip to the day of
the makin' of this acquitance

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumys with the
avys' of the court that is the xv day of marche Instan' to ansuer'
to the borghe strekit one him be sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' knycht for
the wranguys' haldin fra him of ane Ros' nobile lent to him

The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' knycht protestit Solempnitlie
for his costis Skathtis expensis maid' and Sustenit be him in
the said' action'

The saide day Androw fyf protestit for Remed' of law and askit ane
lauchfullie day at the balyeis to ansuer' to the said' borghe strekit on'
him be sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' knycht

The saide day Androw nachtj officiar' at commavnd' of the balyeis
chargit Androw fyf be his hande to reman within the tolbutht quhile he fynde' Souerte to Comper
befor thame one friday the xv day of this Instan' monetht
of marche to ansuer to the said' borghe and the saide Androw atour the said' charge passit
out of the tolbutht and fand' nay Souerte And' thareftir William
Scrimgeour' and James leis officiaris of the said' burghe at commavnd'
of the balyeis passit and chargit the said Androw fyf to comper
and cum agane befor thame to fynd' Souerte to Comper one the said'
friday And to ansuer' to the said' borghe' and the saide officiaris preuyt
Sufficientlie thar saide charge and that the saide Androw said thai
hed' nay pouer' to charge him and that he wald' nocht cum agan
for thar' charge

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne patrik leslie
forspekar that quhen Androw litstar' has pait his ferme to margaret Rede
the Relict of Jonhne gilespy for ane croft' quhilk he has in tak
of hir' gyf the said croft be nocht thre bollis of ber' savyn' the said
margaret sal recompens' to him the Costis and skathtis that is bigan in
Safar' as he wantis of the said' thre bollis of ber' savyn' fra
It be knavyn'

The saide day Androw mureson' grantit him to pay to James
les xxvj s' vsual money of Scotland' for ane meyr' at
Saint serffis day next to cum

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv die mensis marcij
quo Supra

The saide day William of buchan gravntit to his modir the chamer
that scho now lyis in within his Inland' for al the dais of hir'
lywe without ony Impediment with fre vsche and Entre and fre of
ale maile and Annuell

The saide day It was deliuerit and fundin be ane suorne
assis' Alexander Rede Jonhne Colison' Thomas prat Androw murray
William portar William portar blinsele Alexander gray William Wormet
Jonhne Steuinson' Jhone andirsone Johne Thomsone Patrik Rede
and Jonhne of Kintor be the moutht of alexander Rede forspekar
of the said' assis' that Dauid Steuart sal pay to Cornelis
Corneylson' opidane of the Campuer' xlv s' and his costis safer'
as he wantis quhile monunday that next Cumis and syne the
said' Cornelys salbe fre to pas' quhar' he will Ande
gyf the schip be vndir fraucht betuix this and monunday
he sale mak seruice in hir' and he be mastir that was mastir
of befor' he havand' his expensis

The saide day Elene Colly deponit the gret aithe that scho
resignit hir coniunctfeftment of the Inland liand in the Castalgat
in the handis of James Colison' ane of the balyes of this
burghe' to gif Sesin of the Samyn to William buchane
hir sone becaus' scho was nocht of pouer' to vphald' the
samyn and mak the dikis et cetera

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviijodie
marcij quo Supra

The saide day thir personis vndir writin Alexander menyes' Robert
blinsele Jonhne Cullane Alexander chamer Jonhne Collisone
gilbert menyes William blinsele Patrik andirsone patrik leslie
William futhes Jonhne mar' Duncan Colison' William Wormet
allane litstar' Jonhne Steuinsone Patrik rede William
Wormet William andirsone and george bysset was chosin and
Suorne in ane assis' quhilkis riplie avisit fand Sandy nachtj
yongar Sone to Androw nachty quyt of ale nycht waking
be the moutht of Alexander chamer forspekar of the said assis'

The saide day It was deliuerit be the said assis' Alexander
chamer forspekar that Riche rollande salbe bannyst and
excludit this towne opinlie at the mercat Corce with
ane crovne of paper one his heid' for his oppin and
manefest demeritis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die
mensis marcij quo Supra

The saide day comperit gilbert litstar' befor the aldirman
and ballieis and exponit oppinlie and declarit how he hed'
Certane littit clath pertening to Induellaris of this burghe and to
landmen and part of weddis and gagis Ande thar was certane
brokin folkis wacheand' in the nicht and he and his folkis
nychtlie stude one thar' feit kepand' the said gudis
and for the eschevin of Skathis he causit mavnys belman
to pas' throw the haill tone and be his handbell opinlie
warnit and chargit ale and Sindrie personis bath to burghe
and land that hed ony clath or' weddis with the said gilbert
to Cum furthtwith and Rede thar' said clathis and weddis within
xxiiij houris and protestand Solemptlie gyf thai come
nocht and the said clath or weddis happinnis as god forbid'
to be stollin or Skathit that he be quyt and skathles
tharof in tym' to Cum befor' thir witnes sere Jhon' ruthirfurd aldirman
Androw Cullan Richard' Waus balyeis Johne mar' patrik andirsone
James Colison' Duncan Colison' Johne Duncansone philp
Dunbrek

Curia Capitalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta
in pretorio eiusdem Octauo die mensis aprilis Anno Domini millesimo
quadringentesimo nonagesimo Nono quo die Sectis vocatis et curia
affirmata Absentes patent in Rotulo Secte

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem legittimam quod Johannes
Cullane est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Roberti Cullane
patris suj Igitur datum fuit in mandatis Thome leslie vnj ballivorum
eiusdem quatenus accederet cum notario et testibus fidedignis ad cognoscendum
eundem Johannem Cullane ad terras suas secundum laudabiles Consuetudines
burgorum

The saide day sere alexander club chaplane allegit and tuk to preywe that
he hed' content and pait mastir theman Crab of al annuellis Rentis
bigan aucht to him of the wast land' liand in the vuirkirkgat
pertening to his brothir sone and protestit quhat beis done in the processing
Of the said land be Dauid liele procurator to the said mastir theman
turne him nor his brothir sone to nay preiudice

head.add: Judicium processus domini Johannis ruthirfurd' prepositi

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes ruthirfurd miles ac prepositus
et protestatus fuit in foru
Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominum Johannem ruthirfurd militem
ac prepositum et suos procuratores deductis de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis
Cuiusdam terre penitus vaste Jacentis infra dictum burgum in vico superiori ecclesie ex
australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam henrici tulidef ex orientali ex vna
et torentem ad aqueductum molendinorum ex occidentali partibus ab altera
et terram dicti militis versus austrum et Communionem viam regiam versus boriam
in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus xiiijor s' vsualis monete
scocie a longo tempore debit' et non solut' vnde Dauid liell procuratorio
nomine dicti militis peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris
et iusticie complementum Ac porexit plegium in manibus seriandi
quod ipse miles proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre cum pertinenciis legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis
dicti annuj Redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis Wilyeamsone Junioris Curie pro Judicio
datum fuit Teste Curia ac Alexandro menyes Roberto blinsel Alexandro Rede Johanne Cullan
Johanne Colison' thoma prat Ricardo ruthirfurd' Willelmo blinsel magistro de philippo Dunbrek
et cetera diuersis aliis

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per Dauid liell procurator magistrj themannj
Crab deductis de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre
penitus vaste quondam Roberti Club pertinentis Jacentis infra burgum de Aberdene
in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram olim Thome
Waus ex orientalj ex vna et terram quondam henricj tulideff ex occidentalj
partibus ab altera et terram dominj Johannis ruthirfurd' militis versus austrum et
communionem viam regiam versus boriam in defectu solucionis vnius annuj
Redditus quadraginta denariorum vsualis monete scocie a longo tempore
debit' et non solut' vnde Dauid liell procuratorio nomine dictj magistri
themannj pecijt a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et Justicie
Complementum ac porrexit plegium In manibus seriandj
quod ipse Dauid procuratorio nomine dicti magistri themannj proprietatem et possessionem
dicte terre cum pertinenciis legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis
dictj annuj Redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamson' Judicatoris curie pro
Judicio datum fuit Teste Curia ac Alexandro menyeis Roberto blinsell Alexandro
Rede Johanne Cullane Johanne Collisone thoma prat Ricardo ruthirfurd'
Willelmo blinseill cum diuersis aliis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xj die
mensis aprilis anno quo Supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis with avys' of the Court' assignit monunday
the xv day of this Instan' aprile to William andirson' eldar to ansuer' perempturlie
to the borghe strekit one him be henry forbes of Kynnellar' for the wrang
uys' haldin fra him of Certan Joualis that is to say ane masar' sex
Siluer spvnis iij Siluer beltis iij siluer pecis and ij goblatis of Siluer

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis with avys' of the Court assignit
monunday the xxij day of this Instant monetht of aprile to William
of buchan one that ane part And to Cristiane lilburne Spous' to Thomas
Ridale one that vthir to Comper' befor thame bringand' with thame sic richtis
documentis and writis quhilkis thai wile vys' Anent the tak of the Inland'
quhar' the said' thomas duellis clamyt be him and his wyf for the smale
ende of the said' clame
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo die Aprilis

The saide day Jonhne Syme grantit hyme awand' to Williame
Walcar xxv s' To be pait at mydsomere next her'eftir callit the fest of
the Natiuite of sanct Jonhne the baptist

Eodem die Agnes bawn' amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis Collison'
prelocutorem eiusdem pro perturbio agnetis beuerlay cui' emendabit ut Jura
volunt et dicta agnes beuerlay conuicta fuit de perturbio prese Agentis
bawn'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv die
aprilis anno quo Supra

The saide day Thome Wilsone pynour grantit him borghe and Souerte
to Jonhne litstar for tua markis for ane hors' bocht be James Kay
to be pait j merk at pasche last bigane and ane vthir mark at
Sanct seruanys day next to Cum And the saide James grantit that he
suld' freithe and releyve the saide Thomas of the said tua merkis
quhilkis the balyeis chargit the

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Dauid
menyeis forspekar that the borghe' strekit be henry forbes of Kynnellar'
apone William andirsone eldar for the wranguis' haldin fra him of
ane masar' sex Siluer spvnis iij Siluer sp beltis iij siluer pecis and ij
goblatis was nayne of vale and that the said William hed' nocht wrangit
as yet in the haldin of the said Joualis And atour thai ordanit the sad
William to deliuer the said Joualis to the said henry the saide henry
fyndand sikir Sufficient Souerte within this burghe to the said William
to keipe him skathles of the saide Joualis as efferis

Eodem die Agnes meldrum amerciatur per assisam Juratam per perturbio Roberti
moir' ex ore patricij rede prelocutoris assise Cuj emendabit ut iura volunt

The saide day Walter gareauche entirit Jonhne William mathesone in Kynnellar'
befor the balyeis as he that come Souerte to entir him to ansuer' at the Instance
of Richerde bernys and the said Richerd was lauchfullie Callit to
follow him and nocht Comperit tharfor the saide William protestit for his costis
and skathtis and that he suld' nocht ansuer' quhile he be new follouit

The xvj day of aprile James Kintor and Robert Kintor his sone oblist tham
coniunctlie and seueralie be the fathtis of thar bodiis renunciand' the benefice of diui
sion' to pay to James Colisone half ane barrel of girls' at mydsommir
next hereftir for redy money pait to tham

The saide day James Kintor assignit to Thomas leslie the first
querd of lax with met fische and for querd fische that fallis to him for the
demi barrele of Salmond' aucht to Thome menyes

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij die aprilis
quo Supra

head.add: Ro blinsel g menyeis Thomas leslie and David Steuart

div.p:
The saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
William blinsel forspekar' that Robert blinsele gilbert menyes and thomas
leslie was quyt of ony pament of xlv s' pait obtenit apone
Dauid Steuart be Cornelis Cornelsone opidan' of the Campuer'

The said day Alexander Rede Come souerte to keip the balyeis skathles
of xxxv s' of l xlv s' optenit apone Dauid Steuart be Cornelis
Cornelsone opidane of the Campuer' And the said Dauid Oblist
him be his handis and gudis to freithe the said Alexander and keip him skathles
tharanent
